mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shift_records( patient_id, shift_time, shift_type, handover_nurse, takeover_nurse, patient_status, special_notes ) VALUES ( #{patientId}, #{shiftTime}, #{shiftType}, #{handoverNurse}, #{takeoverNurse}, #{patientStatus}, #{specialNotes} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM shift_records WHERE patient_id = #{patientId} ORDER BY shift_time DESC LIMIT 1
